(penv) rohits@rohits-desktop:~/Uber/pyro-ss-vae/examples/ss-vae$ python partial_sup_vae_simple.py --hack 1 -n 100 -sup 50 Training set size: 60000, Testing set size: 10000 Segmentation fault (core dumped)

comments.comment: Using the master branch of pyTorch fixes this issue.
